options.text: Prior to deployment, make sure you meet the prerequisites outlined in the resource pre-reqs section in Zero Trust Image solution documentation:

elements.name: resourceGroup
elements.label: Deployment Resource Group
elements.toolTip: Select the name of the existing resource group where the image will be created. Recommended to use the same resource group where the compute gallery resides.

elements.name: virtualNetwork
elements.label: Virtual Network
elements.toolTip: Select an existing virtual network for image capture.

constraints.allowedValues: [map(filter(steps('info').network.virtualNetworksApi.value, (item) => equals(item.location, steps('basics').scope.location.name)), (item) => parse(concat('{"label":"', item.name, '","description":"Resource group: ', first(skip(split(item.id, '/'), 4)), '","value":"', item.id, '"}')))]

elements.name: subnet
elements.label: Subnet
elements.toolTip: Select an existing subnet for the image capture.

elements.name: majorVersion
elements.label: Image Major Version. The minor and patch versions will be auto generated.

elements.name: minorVersion
elements.label: Image Patch Version. The minor version will be auto generated.

elements.name: offer
elements.label: Offer
elements.toolTip: Select the desired marketplace image offer.

elements.name: sku
elements.label: SKU
elements.toolTip: Select the desired marketplace image SKU.

elements.name: replicaCount
elements.label: Replica count
elements.toolTip: Regional replica count which specifies the number of replicas you want to create per region

elements.name: customSoftware
elements.label: customSoftware
elements.toolTip: Select True to add custom software to the image

elements.name: installOneDriveForBusiness
elements.label: Install One Dive For Business
elements.toolTip: Select True to Install One Dive For Business

elements.name: installSkypeForBusiness
elements.label: Install Skype For Business
elements.toolTip: Select True to install Skype For Business

elements.name: msrdcwebrtcsvcInstaller
elements.toolTip: Select Remote Desktop WebRTC Redirector Service
elements.label: Remote Desktop WebRTC Redirector Service Installer (.msi)

elements.name: installVirtualDesktopOptimizationTool
elements.label: Install Virtual Desktop OptimizationTool
elements.toolTip: Select True to install Virtual Desktop OptimizationTool
